Quote.Author: Halle Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not sad at all about turning 40

Quote.Author: Halle Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: By the time I left school, I had a lot of tenacity

Quote.Author: Halsey
Quote.QuoteValue: I wear my personality on my sleeve, for sure, and my look is constantly changing because so am I

Quote.Author: Halsey
Quote.QuoteValue: The hardest thing about writing my second album is that I had 20 years to write my first album

Quote.Author: Halsey
Quote.QuoteValue: You can be accessible without catering to an audience

Quote.Author: Halsey
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to remember for every kid saying something awful, there's a kid saying something great

Quote.Author: Halsey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not actually even a very good singer. I'm not

Quote.Author: Halsey
Quote.QuoteValue: People are so afraid to talk about real things, but they're experiences that everyone goes through

Quote.Author: Halsey
Quote.QuoteValue: I love pop music, but at the same time, I'm seeking to write whatever I'm organically inclined to

Quote.Author: Halsey
Quote.QuoteValue: That's one thing the musicians don't remember: you don't choose your demographic - they choose you

Quote.Author: Halsey
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was in high school, I was a bad kid and a good student

Quote.Author: Halsey
Quote.QuoteValue: People around me like me the best when I'm depressed because I'm a bit more passive

Quote.Author: Halston Sage
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite weekend activity is riding bikes to breakfast

Quote.Author: Halston Sage
Quote.QuoteValue: I always start the day by washing my face and moisturizing

Quote.Author: Halston Sage
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole experience on 'Grown Ups 2' was like going to adult summer camp

Quote.Author: Halston Sage
Quote.QuoteValue: I love dogs. I have a Golden Doodle and an Alaskan Klee Kai

Quote.Author: Halston Sage
Quote.QuoteValue: New York City is my favorite city in the world

Quote.Author: Halston Sage
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm 20 years old, and I still love love. I hope I'm sweet. Just your everyday girl

Quote.Author: Halston Sage
Quote.QuoteValue: Things I say are sometimes silly

Quote.Author: Halston Sage
Quote.QuoteValue: My dad is afraid of my laugh

Quote.Author: Halston Sage
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Girl, Interrupted' is one of my favorite movies

Quote.Author: Halston Sage
Quote.QuoteValue: I did grow up reading the 'Twilight' books. I feel guilty, but I was always Team Edward

Quote.Author: Hamza Yusuf
Quote.QuoteValue: All of the people are the dependents of Allah

Quote.Author: Hamza Yusuf
Quote.QuoteValue: Live your lives. Go out; take walks amongst trees

Quote.Author: Hamza Yusuf
Quote.QuoteValue: Islam was hijacked on that September 11, 2001, on that plane, as an innocent victim

Quote.Author: Hamza Yusuf
Quote.QuoteValue: Katrina did much more damage than anything the terrorists could ever put together

Quote.Author: Hamza Yusuf
Quote.QuoteValue: People can't think when their minds are clouded with fear

Quote.Author: Hamza Yusuf
Quote.QuoteValue: America is about choices, including those to live certain lifestyles

Quote.Author: Hamza Yusuf
Quote.QuoteValue: I know that people can live celibate lives. I did it myself for many years

Quote.Author: Hamza Yusuf
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't have religious fallibilism, you have immense problems

Quote.Author: Hamza Yusuf
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't fight ideas with bombs

Quote.Author: Hamza Yusuf
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that the idea of a war on an abstract noun is unacceptable

Quote.Author: Hank Azaria
Quote.QuoteValue: Godzilla's a monster for the '90s. He's been working out

Quote.Author: Hank Azaria
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're on a series that's been cancelled, there's a little bit of a stink on you

Quote.Author: Hank Azaria
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been doing silly voices since I was a child

Quote.Author: Hank Azaria
Quote.QuoteValue: Just watching Jack Lemmon made me want to get into this business

Quote.Author: Hank Azaria
Quote.QuoteValue: I love acting, but I want to explore other things

Quote.Author: Hank Azaria
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no experience like on-the-job training

Quote.Author: Hank Azaria
Quote.QuoteValue: I had kind of sworn off network TV a while ago

Quote.Author: Hank Azaria
Quote.QuoteValue: When you do well in a movie that's seen as really great, you're revitalized for six weeks

Quote.Author: Hank Azaria
Quote.QuoteValue: I bartended for a catering company for two or three years

Quote.Author: Hank Azaria
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very happy I get to keep working - it's an insanely fortunate thing

Quote.Author: Hanna Rosin
Quote.QuoteValue: If men can quilt and take over the kitchen, then women can pick up a wrench and fix a leaky pipe

Quote.Author: Hanna Rosin
Quote.QuoteValue: The modern economy is becoming a place where women hold the cards

Quote.Author: Hanna Rosin
Quote.QuoteValue: I could do a franchise for the end of everything. 'The End of Dogs,' 'The End of Cats.'

Quote.Author: Hanna Rosin
Quote.QuoteValue: Factories not what they used to be - they're all extremely high-tech

Quote.Author: Hanna Rosin
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no 'natural' order, only the way things are

Quote.Author: Hanna Rosin
Quote.QuoteValue: Feminism was about making women's lives less constrained and giving them more choices

Quote.Author: Hanna Rosin
Quote.QuoteValue: Pop culture is like our subconscious

Quote.Author: Hanna Rosin
Quote.QuoteValue: Women are choosing to stay single rather than marry men who can't step up and provide

Quote.Author: Hanna Rosin
Quote.QuoteValue: Men need marriage more than women do. In fact, they need it to survive

Quote.Author: Hanna Rosin
Quote.QuoteValue: You need to prepare the child you have for the world that exists

Quote.Author: Hannah Simone
Quote.QuoteValue: Working opposite Max Greenfield is the best job in the world. He's just incredible

Quote.Author: Hannah Simone
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you get a kitten, the natural thing you do is take a billion photos

Quote.Author: Hannah Simone
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom used to call me a parrot, because the way I spoke would change in every country we'd go to

Quote.Author: Hannah Simone
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Curvy' is just a polite way of saying 'fat.'

Quote.Author: Hannah Simone
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't force chemistry. It's either there or it's not. You can't create it

Quote.Author: Hannah Simone
Quote.QuoteValue: Flirting is funny. And it's awkward and weird

Quote.Author: Hannah Simone
Quote.QuoteValue: I am passionate about human rights

Quote.Author: Hannah Simone
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been on stage since I was eight

Quote.Author: Hannah Simone
Quote.QuoteValue: It comes down to personal style, and that's what's sexy and attractive in a man

Quote.Author: Hannah Simone
Quote.QuoteValue: I have an extended family of close friends, guy and girls

Quote.Author: Hannibal Buress
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy is basically self-deprecation

Quote.Author: Hannibal Buress
Quote.QuoteValue: I like that Barack got that job

Quote.Author: Hannibal Buress
Quote.QuoteValue: I like getting 'Times' articles online. But the actual paper just has too many words

Quote.Author: Hannibal Buress
Quote.QuoteValue: In my hometown of Chicago, I'm kind of a medium deal

Quote.Author: Hannibal Buress
Quote.QuoteValue: 'SNL' is the first real job I've held for more than a month and a half

Quote.Author: Hannibal Buress
Quote.QuoteValue: With sitcom writing, you're trying to write stories

Quote.Author: Hannibal Buress
Quote.QuoteValue: I can work as a writer, but I wanted to do stand-up

Quote.Author: Hannibal Buress
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't really tried to write a movie. It's tough to get into that mode

Quote.Author: Hannibal Buress
Quote.QuoteValue: I really like Halal food

Quote.Author: Hannibal Buress
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to be remembered as good person and as one of the best comedians of my generation

Quote.Author: Hans Hofmann
Quote.QuoteValue: Every art expression is rooted fundamentally in the personality and temperament of the artist

Quote.Author: Hans Hofmann
Quote.QuoteValue: Through a painting we can see the whole world

Quote.Author: Hans Hofmann
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole world, as we experience it visually, comes to us through the mystic realm of color

Quote.Author: Hans Hofmann
Quote.QuoteValue: The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak

Quote.Author: Hans Hofmann
Quote.QuoteValue: A work of art is a world in itself reflecting senses and emotions of the artist's world

Quote.Author: Hans Hofmann
Quote.QuoteValue: Painters must speak through paint, not through words

Quote.Author: Hans Hofmann
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not the form that dictates the color, but the color that brings out the form

Quote.Author: Hans Hofmann
Quote.QuoteValue: Being inexhaustible, life and nature are a constant stimulus for a creative mind

Quote.Author: Hans Hofmann
Quote.QuoteValue: In nature, light creates the color. In the picture, color creates the light

Quote.Author: Hans Hofmann
Quote.QuoteValue: Art cannot result from sophisticated, frivolous, or superficial effects

Quote.Author: Hansika Motwani
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever I am asked about my personal relationships, I politely reply, 'No comments.'

Quote.Author: Hansika Motwani
Quote.QuoteValue: I need to thank my director, producers, and artists as well crew members of all my projects

Quote.Author: Hansika Motwani
Quote.QuoteValue: The only time my workout goes a little haywire is when I'm travelling

Quote.Author: Hansika Motwani
Quote.QuoteValue: Even when I turn 60, they'll call me a child actor

Quote.Author: Hansika Motwani
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no point in pointing fingers because there are three fingers pointing back at you

Quote.Author: Hansika Motwani
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has a breakup in their lives, and I think everyone should experience love

Quote.Author: Hansika Motwani
Quote.QuoteValue: Fame gives you a high

Quote.Author: Hansika Motwani
Quote.QuoteValue: Asked to choose between money and fame, I'd choose the latter every time

Quote.Author: Hansika Motwani
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate interference, and I don't interfere in others' lives

Quote.Author: Hansika Motwani
Quote.QuoteValue: I always give importance to scripts first, and remuneration is something that comes later

Quote.Author: Harlan Coben
Quote.QuoteValue: Make no mistake, adolescence is a war. No one gets out unscathed

Quote.Author: Harlan Coben
Quote.QuoteValue: More than once, I've wished my real life had a delete key

Quote.Author: Harlan Coben
Quote.QuoteValue: A novel is like a sausage. You might like the final taste but you don't want to see how it was made

Quote.Author: Harlan Coben
Quote.QuoteValue: Hope can be the most wonderful thing in the world or it can crush your heart like an eggshell

Quote.Author: Harlan Coben
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not very happy idle. There's always this voice in my head that says, 'I should be writing.'

Quote.Author: Harlan Coben
Quote.QuoteValue: If I didn't write, I'd be like a duvet cover; I have no other marketable skills

Quote.Author: Harlan Coben
Quote.QuoteValue: In real life, coincidences happen all the time. In novels, they are leapt upon with fury

Quote.Author: Harlan Coben
Quote.QuoteValue: Tragedy is a hell of a teacher. It's much too strict, but it's a hell of a teacher

Quote.Author: Harlan Coben
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm thinking of taking up golf, but the idea of spending time with golfers frightens me

Quote.Author: Harlan Coben
Quote.QuoteValue: Only bad writers think they're good

Quote.Author: Harmony Korine
Quote.QuoteValue: Cinema sustains life. It captures death in its progress

Quote.Author: Harmony Korine
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a guidance counsellor who made me take an aptitude test, and told me I should be a bricklayer

Quote.Author: Harmony Korine
Quote.QuoteValue: What I remember myself from films, and what I love about films, is specific scenes and characters

Quote.Author: Harmony Korine
Quote.QuoteValue: I've started lots of books, but it's hard for me to finish them

Quote.Author: Harmony Korine
Quote.QuoteValue: I tried college and I hated that. I seem to quit everything I do

Quote.Author: Harmony Korine
Quote.QuoteValue: I never feel like there's any one point to the film, to anything, to any of the movies I've made

Quote.Author: Harmony Korine
Quote.QuoteValue: I was free when I was 12 because I got my first skateboard. I've been free ever since

Quote.Author: Harmony Korine
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes, when you watch people play a video game, they seem lost in this wormhole, or in a trance

Quote.Author: Harmony Korine
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always - honestly - never thought of myself as an independent director

Quote.Author: Harmony Korine
Quote.QuoteValue: I've just always liked watching people dance. I can't explain it. It used to just make me laugh

Quote.Author: Harold Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't meet the standards, then you don't qualify

Quote.Author: Harold Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: To say that I am pro life is just wrong. I am personally pro-choice and legislatively pro-choice

Quote.Author: Harold Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Public service is a part of who I am, having grown up in a family of politicians

Quote.Author: Harold Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Killing terrorists is cheaper than capturing them

Quote.Author: Harold Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a Yankees fan. I should say - have been to more Yankees games than Mets games

Quote.Author: Harold Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a Democrat. But I am an independent Democrat

Quote.Author: Harold Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I love New York, I love the smell of New York... I love the subway

Quote.Author: Harold Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: One bipartisan policy tradition is to deny Americans the use of our own resources

Quote.Author: Harold Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I either run or try to play basketball every day

Quote.Author: Harold Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm in an interracial marriage

Quote.Author: Harold Pinter
Quote.QuoteValue: It's so easy for propaganda to work, and dissent to be mocked

Quote.Author: Harold Pinter
Quote.QuoteValue: Apart from the known and the unknown, what else is there?

Quote.Author: Harold Pinter
Quote.QuoteValue: One way of looking at speech is to say it is a constant stratagem to cover nakedness

Quote.Author: Harold Pinter
Quote.QuoteValue: Good writing excites me, and makes life worth living

Quote.Author: Harold Pinter
Quote.QuoteValue: A short piece of work means as much to me as a long piece of work

Quote.Author: Harold Pinter
Quote.QuoteValue: Beckett had an unerring light on things, which I much appreciated

Quote.Author: Harold Pinter
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it is the responsibility of a citizen of any country to say what he thinks

Quote.Author: Harold Pinter
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that NATO is itself a war criminal

Quote.Author: Harold Pinter
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of the press is in league with government, or with the status quo

Quote.Author: Harold Pinter
Quote.QuoteValue: One's life has many compartments

Quote.Author: Harold Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: Throwing money at something doesn't really create - forgive me that onerous word - art

Quote.Author: Harold Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always glad to see somebody rethink something rather than reproduce something I did

Quote.Author: Harold Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: I love big, bold, truthful theater - the tradition of Victorian theater

Quote.Author: Harold Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: I really don't spend time thinking about the past. I think about the future. I'm not stopping

Quote.Author: Harold Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't want to be just pigeonholed as an extravagant director

Quote.Author: Harold Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: I've seen a lot of 'Show Boats,' but I've never seen the one that thoroughly satisfies me

Quote.Author: Harold Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: You do a show to be a hit and hopefully run a couple of years

Quote.Author: Harold Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: The perfect expression of receiving a lifetime award is to be working when they're handing it out

Quote.Author: Harold Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: Criticism is valuable... and self-congratulatory experiences are not

Quote.Author: Harold Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: Despite the successes, you remember the failures - rather lovingly

Quote.Author: Harold Ramis
Quote.QuoteValue: I never work just to work. It's some combination of laziness and self-respect

Quote.Author: Harold Ramis
Quote.QuoteValue: How one handles success or failure is determined by their early childhood

Quote.Author: Harold Ramis
Quote.QuoteValue: I never read Playboy before I started working there and stopped reading it the day I quit

Quote.Author: Harold Ramis
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing reinforces a professional relationship more than enjoying success with someone

Quote.Author: Harold Ramis
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all several different people. There are different aspects of our nature that are competing

Quote.Author: Harold Ramis
Quote.QuoteValue: I always claim that the writer has done 90 percent of the director's work

Quote.Author: Harold Ramis
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a lot of fun working with John Candy. We had a pretty good rapport

Quote.Author: Harold Ramis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to think I'd never do a gratuitous fart joke

Quote.Author: Harold Ramis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a believer in the pratfall. I don't think it's funny just to have someone fall down

Quote.Author: Harold Ramis
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter what I have to say, I'm still trying to say it in comedic form

Quote.Author: Harold S. Geneen
Quote.QuoteValue: Leadership is practiced not so much in words as in attitude and in actions

Quote.Author: Harold S. Geneen
Quote.QuoteValue: Leadership cannot really be taught. It can only be learned

Quote.Author: Harold S. Geneen
Quote.QuoteValue: Uncertainty will always be part of the taking charge process

Quote.Author: Harold S. Geneen
Quote.QuoteValue: Management must manage!

Quote.Author: Harold S. Geneen
Quote.QuoteValue: It is much more difficult to measure nonperformance than performance

Quote.Author: Harold S. Geneen
Quote.QuoteValue: Performance stands out like a ton of diamonds. Nonperformance can always be explained away

Quote.Author: Harold S. Geneen
Quote.QuoteValue: He suffered from paralysis by analysis

Quote.Author: Harold S. Geneen
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't run a business or anything else on a theory

Quote.Author: Harold S. Geneen
Quote.QuoteValue: Management manages by making decisions and by seeing that those decisions are implemented

Quote.Author: Harold S. Geneen
Quote.QuoteValue: If your desk isn't cluttered, you probably aren't doing your job

Quote.Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
Quote.QuoteValue: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn

Quote.Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
Quote.QuoteValue: The bitterest tears shed over graves are for words left unsaid and deeds left undone

Quote.Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
Quote.QuoteValue: Any mind that is capable of real sorrow is capable of good

Quote.Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
Quote.QuoteValue: The past, the present and the future are really one: they are today

Quote.Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendships are discovered rather than made

Quote.Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
Quote.QuoteValue: Most mothers are instinctive philosophers

Quote.Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
Quote.QuoteValue: No one is so thoroughly superstitious as the godless man

Quote.Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
Quote.QuoteValue: I did not write it. God wrote it. I merely did his dictation

Quote.Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
Quote.QuoteValue: Perhaps it is impossible for a person who does no good to do no harm

Quote.Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
Quote.QuoteValue: The obstinacy of cleverness and reason is nothing to the obstinacy of folly and inanity

Quote.Author: Harrison Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: We all have big changes in our lives that are more or less a second chance

Quote.Author: Harrison Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: The kindest word to describe my performance in school was Sloth

Quote.Author: Harrison Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I could take Sean Connery in a fight... I could definitely take him

Quote.Author: Harrison Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Am I grumpy? I might be. But I think maybe sometimes it's misinterpreted

Quote.Author: Harrison Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: You know you're getting old when all the names in your black book have M. D. after them

Quote.Author: Harrison Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm addicted to Altoids. I call them 'acting pills.'

Quote.Author: Harrison Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: All my friends were going off to be professionals, and I said I wanted to be an actor

Quote.Author: Harrison Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Bikes and planes aren't about going fast or having fun; they're toys, but serious ones

Quote.Author: Harrison Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Directing is too hard, it takes too much time, and it doesn't pay very well

Quote.Author: Harrison Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the comic opportunities that come up in the context of a father-son relationship

Quote.Author: Harry Browne
Quote.QuoteValue: The important thing is to concentrate upon what you can do - by yourself, upon your own initiative

Quote.Author: Harry Browne
Quote.QuoteValue: You are where you are today because you have chosen to be there

Quote.Author: Harry Browne
Quote.QuoteValue: Since no one but you can know what's best for you, government control can't make your life better

Quote.Author: Harry Browne
Quote.QuoteValue: Each person is living for himself; his own happiness is all he can ever personally feel

Quote.Author: Harry Browne
Quote.QuoteValue: A great burden was lifted from my shoulders the day I realized that no one owes me anything

Quote.Author: Harry Browne
Quote.QuoteValue: For most of our history, Americans enjoyed both liberty and security from foreign threats

Quote.Author: Harry Browne
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm sorry that I can't snap my fingers and undo 50 years of bad American foreign policy

Quote.Author: Harry Browne
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom and responsibility aren't interconnected things. They are the same thing

Quote.Author: Harry Browne
Quote.QuoteValue: The Constitution isn't written in Chinese, Swahili or Sanskrit. It's in plain English

Quote.Author: Harry Browne
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever I say that America has become an empire, someone is sure to say I'm being ridiculous

Quote.Author: Harry Connick, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: My Dad is my hero

Quote.Author: Harry Connick, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I do the things I like to do. It's sort of a bigger version of having more than one hobby

Quote.Author: Harry Connick, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I have worked with Habitat for Humanity for awhile

Quote.Author: Harry Connick, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Safety's just danger, out of place

Quote.Author: Harry Connick, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything I do is part of my passion

Quote.Author: Harry Connick, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: My life is spontaneous and things just kind of happen

Quote.Author: Harry Connick, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I say sorry to my wife about five times a day for various reasons

Quote.Author: Harry Connick, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I've spent hours playing video games

Quote.Author: Harry Connick, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: The two are unrelated. I'm not into turtles or space stuff

Quote.Author: Harry Connick, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I practice and work hard at my music, but I'm not saving lives here

Quote.Author: Harry Emerson Fosdick
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever you laugh at in others, laughs at yourself

Quote.Author: Harry Emerson Fosdick
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't simply retire from something; have something to retire to

Quote.Author: Harry Emerson Fosdick
Quote.QuoteValue: Hating people is like burning down your own house to get rid of a rat

Quote.Author: Harry Emerson Fosdick
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberty is always dangerous, but it is the safest thing we have

Quote.Author: Harry Emerson Fosdick
Quote.QuoteValue: Preaching is personal counseling on a group basis

Quote.Author: Harry Emerson Fosdick
Quote.QuoteValue: Christians are supposed not merely to endure change, nor even to profit by it, but to cause it

Quote.Author: Harry Emerson Fosdick
Quote.QuoteValue: The steady discipline of intimate friendship with Jesus results in men becoming like Him

Quote.Author: Harry Emerson Fosdick
Quote.QuoteValue: A person wrapped up in himself makes a small package

Quote.Author: Harry Emerson Fosdick
Quote.QuoteValue: Bitterness imprisons life; love releases it

Quote.Author: Harry Emerson Fosdick
Quote.QuoteValue: Religion is not a burden, not a weight, it is wings

Quote.Author: Harry Houdini
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a great admirer of mystery and magic. Look at this life - all mystery and magic

Quote.Author: Harry Houdini
Quote.QuoteValue: What the eyes see and the ears hear, the mind believes

Quote.Author: Harry Houdini
Quote.QuoteValue: Fire has always been and, seemingly, will always remain, the most terrible of the elements

Quote.Author: Harry Houdini
Quote.QuoteValue: It is still an open question, however, as to what extent exposure really injures a performer

Quote.Author: Harry Houdini
Quote.QuoteValue: No performer should attempt to bite off red-hot iron unless he has a good set of teeth

Quote.Author: Harry Houdini
Quote.QuoteValue: Only one man ever betrayed my confidence, and that only in a minor matter

Quote.Author: Harry Houdini
Quote.QuoteValue: The eating of burning brimstone is an entirely fake performance

Quote.Author: Harry Houdini
Quote.QuoteValue: The great day of the Fire-eater - or, should I say, the day of the great Fire-eater - has passed

Quote.Author: Harry Houdini
Quote.QuoteValue: The pickpocket is usually very well dressed and of prepossessing appearance

Quote.Author: Harry Houdini
Quote.QuoteValue: It is needless to say that women make the most patient as well as the most dangerous pickpockets

Quote.Author: Harry Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: I love this club, and to be wearing number 10 for Tottenham is amazing for me. I could not resist

Quote.Author: Harry Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to keep working hard and looking to progress

Quote.Author: Harry Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe defenders don't always get the recognition like the other players get

Quote.Author: Harry Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: When times are down, keep believing, keep working hard, and things will pick up

Quote.Author: Harry Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: I am motivated by trying to win trophies

Quote.Author: Harry Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever a new manager comes in you want to impress him

Quote.Author: Harry Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very patriotic England fan, actually. I always wore my heart on my sleeve

Quote.Author: Harry Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: You come up against challenges in life, and it's how you deal with them that defines you

Quote.Author: Harry Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm in my own fantasy team as well, so there's quite a bit of pressure on it

Quote.Author: Harry Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: It is about that self-belief, that self-drive, that has got me to where I am now

Quote.Author: Haruki Murakami
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything passes. Nobody gets anything for keeps. And that's how we've got to live

Quote.Author: Haruki Murakami
Quote.QuoteValue: Concentration is one of the happiest things in my life

Quote.Author: Haruki Murakami
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to talk about something new, you have to make up a new kind of language

Quote.Author: Haruki Murakami
Quote.QuoteValue: Among the many values in life, I appreciate freedom most

Quote.Author: Haruki Murakami
Quote.QuoteValue: If you remember me, then I don't care if everyone else forgets

Quote.Author: Haruki Murakami
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no such thing as perfect writing, just like there's no such thing as perfect despair

Quote.Author: Haruki Murakami
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm kind of a big kettle. It takes time to get boiled, but then I'm always hot

Quote.Author: Haruki Murakami
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a fast thinker, but once I am interested in something, I am doing it for many years

Quote.Author: Haruki Murakami
Quote.QuoteValue: Young people these days don't trust anything at all. They want to be free

Quote.Author: Haruki Murakami
Quote.QuoteValue: When I start to write, I don't have any plan at all. I just wait for the story to come

Quote.Author: Harvey Fierstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Art has the power to transform, to illuminate, to educate, inspire and motivate

Quote.Author: Harvey Fierstein
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a lot of fun to play someone you don't normally think of yourself as

Quote.Author: Harvey Fierstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Time will tell us what we did and didn't do

Quote.Author: Harvey Fierstein
Quote.QuoteValue: I am thrilled - I can't stress that enough - thrilled when I see kids getting active

Quote.Author: Harvey Fierstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Always admit when you're wrong. You'll save thousands in therapy... and a few friendships too

Quote.Author: Harvey Fierstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Beware of anyone who says they know. Trust me, they don't, or they wouldn't have to say they did

Quote.Author: Harvey Fierstein
Quote.QuoteValue: I got a lovely check today from being a writer that I earned by sitting at home. That's rewarding

Quote.Author: Harvey Fierstein
Quote.QuoteValue: If you deny yourself commitment, what can you do with your life?
